column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed na NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column13: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor na NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# byang chub sems dpa' log pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la SEL BAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /

column3: le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +de blangs pas bdag nyid chags par 'gyur bar  mthong ba dang  sbyin pa 'khrul du dogs pa dang  'gyod par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  de dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur bar dogs pa dang  sbyin pa'i dngos po de dge 'dun nam mchod rten gyi yin du dogs pa dang  gzhan la mi rigs par 'phrog pa yin du dogs pa dang  rgyu des    de la gnod par 'gyur ba zhig na nyes pa med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692815#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693917#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694338#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column9: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column3: chos 'dod pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i  chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691344#691346#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# MI BYED PA NI DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I tshul khrims KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column5: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column6: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong BAR BYED PA NI DGE BA'I CHOS SDUD PA'I tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column7: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba RNAMS ZHES BYA BA LA  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column8: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    NOR SBYIN PAR MI BYED PA NI PHAN 'dogs PA SBYIN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column9: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar BYED PA NI SDOM PA'I tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi LEN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed PA NI SEMS CAN GYI DON BYA BA'I  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column11: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed NA SEMS CAN GYI DON BYA BA'I tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang BAR MI BYED PA NI MYA ngan bsang bar BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column13: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693896#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143;TD4083E.TXT.r_1144# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs MI BYED PA NI SEMS CAN GYI DON  bya ba rnams kyi grogs BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar KHRO BA LA SOGS PA DE rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa DON DU GNYER BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis SBYONG BAR MI BYED PA NI DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi LEN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR // / +nyes BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA LA rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA NI BYAS pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 2.384#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen BKUR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column5: 2.384#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' 'KHOR 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don GYI MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#691055#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la NYE BAR BOS PA LAS nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column7: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS SEMS can gyi don lhur LEN PA LA KHONG KHRO  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par GYUR NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column8: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693407#693407#TD4083E.TXT.r_1095# bar mi byed par de thams cad du yal bar bor nas nyan thos kyi sde snod nyid la brtson par sbyor zhing goms PAR BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /

column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694338#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column9: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690903#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column3: gang yang pham par 'gyur ba'i phyogs de las nyes byas kyi ltung ba 'di dbye ste / /

de ser snas kun nas blang ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin du 'og ma rnams la yang nyon mongs pa de dang des dbye ba byas pas pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba'i phyogs rnams  rjes su dran par bya'o // /

pham par 'gyur ba'i sgo nas mi 'dra bar bshad pa yin te / / +rang bzhin shes par mi 'gyur ba dang  gzhan ma yin pa dang  ltung ba gsum pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi chos kyis bsdus par grub po // /
tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa sbyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column5: 0.015#TD4083E.TXT.r#693895#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column6: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI GCIG tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par DGA' BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column7: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS BSDUS pa'i rnam par DAG PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI LOG  par lta ba rnam par spangs PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column8: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I  chos so // /
column9: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed PA NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS 'DU 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du MI LEN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya BA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI RJES SU bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar KHRO BA LA SOGS PA DE RNAMS NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS DANG  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du MI LEN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR // / +nyes BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column13: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed PA NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI 'TSHO ba DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su SDUD PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI PHA rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column17: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS BLA ma la rim gro BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column19: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694448#694448#TD4083E.TXT.r_1202# gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshul khrims 'chal zhing log par spyod pa rnams la kun nas mnar sems la sogs  bas yal bar 'dor zhing tshul khrims 'chal ba nyid kyi rkyen gyis de rnams la khyad du gsod cing de rnams la phan pa dang bde ba la gnod par mi byed na / /
nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur te / / +snyom las la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste / /
de rnams nyid la rjes su brtse  bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de rnams 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems bsrungs na nyes pa med do // /
column4: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694423#694423#TD4083E.TXT.r_1199;TD4083E.TXT.r_1200# na ste ma nus pa dang  'dul bar 'dod pa dang  bya ba de gnod pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang      // / +dge 'dun GYI NANG KHRIMS SRUNG BA DANG  GZHAN MANG PO DAG GI SEMS SRUNG BAR 'dod pa dang  mu stegs can tshar gcad pa'i phyir NI NYES PA MED DO // /

column3: pha rol zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan dag dad par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa bcas pa rnams la slob par     // /
mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691192#691193#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par MI BYED PA NI DGE BA'I CHOS SDUD PA dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I  chos so // /
column5: 1.192#TD4083E.TXT.r#693029#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar MI BYED PA NI DGE BA'I CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column6: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column7: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa NYID NI DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS BLA ma la rim gro BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column8: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#693973#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim gro MI BYED PA NI NAD pa'i rim gro BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column9: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par MI BYED PA NI SDOM pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column10: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS SHIN tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog SHES PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693383#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson PA NI DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS THOS pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693711#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar MI BYED PA NI DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI THOS pa la mngon par sbyor BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694305#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don MI BYED PA NI CHOS  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i bya BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694534#694534#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS  so // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694632#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs pa la sogs pa MI BYED PA NI BSDIGS pa la sogs pa'i bya BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693203#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI RTOG pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  DGE BA CHOS SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column17: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par MI BYED PA NI SEMS can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS TE / /

column3: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpas gzhan ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir  bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spangs bar bya ba'i phyir bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa de rnams la / /
column4: 5.960#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342418#1342426#TD4037E.TXT.r_3618;TD4037E.TXT.r_3619# byang chub sems dpa' NI BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS gzhan dag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma dad pa  RNAMS DAD PAR BYA BA DANG  DAD PA RNAMS PHYIR ZHING DBYUNG BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR / /
column5: 5.960#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811686#1811686#TD4082E.TXT.r_592# MA DAD PA RNAMS DAD PAR BYA BA DANG  DAD PA RNAMS PHYIR ZHING  'byung BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR BYED na nyes pa med do // /
column6: 0.016#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342450#1342451#TD4037E.TXT.r_3623# de dag KYANG MA DAD PA RNAMS DAD PAR BYA BA DANG  DAD PA RNAMS PHYIR ZHING 'BYUNG BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR GZHAN gyi yid mi srung bar mi byed de / /
column7: 0.016#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809699#1809700#TD4082E.TXT.r_357# de dag KYANG MA DAD PA RNAMS DAD PAR BYA BA DANG  dad pa    RNAMS PHYIR ZHING 'BYUNG BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR GZHAN gyi yid mi srung bar mi byed de bslab pa rnams la slob na / /
column8: 0.020#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809668#1809675#TD4082E.TXT.r_354# byang chub sems dpa' NI BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS gzhan dag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir MA DAD PA RNAMS DAD PAR BYA BA DANG  DAD PA RNAMS PHYIR ZHING 'BYUNG BAR BYA BA'I PHYIR SO SO THAR PA'I  'dul BA LAS BCAS PA'I KHA NA MA THO BA DANG BCAS PA RNAM par gzhag pa gang yin pa de la nyan thos rnams dang mtshungs par slob ste tha dad par mi byed do // /

column3: ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column9: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column10: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir MI BYED PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column11: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column12: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column13: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column3: de  la chos gang dang gang la kun du spyod par byed pa de ni nyes par 'gyur te / / +byang chub sems dpas ni gzhan rnams kyi las la ches lhag par bya ba yin pa dang  rab tu byung bar gyur pas ni rang gi bslab pa rnams nges par bsrung dgos pa'i phyir ro // /

gal te byang chub sems dpas ni nyan  thos kyi bslab pa rnams la yang bslab par bya ba nyid yin pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpas ni don nyung ba dang bya ba nyung ba la goms par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na / /
bdag gi don lhur len pas ni goms par bya ba yin gyi / / +gzhan gyi don lhur len pa'i phyir 'di ni de ltam yin no zhes  bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.021#TD4061E.TXT.r#1519196#1519197#TD4061E.TXT.r_776;TD4061E.TXT.r_777# mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gtod pa'i phyir nye bar gtod pa'o // / +thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir 'di mthong ba la don  yod pa'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136706#1136706#TD4047E.TXT.r_2233# rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgyad po 'di dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyir dang  yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir  bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya bas phan pa ste gzhan gyi don las brtsams pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2038805#2038805#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_8801# grag go zhes  bya ba'i sgra ni skye ba dbang ba'i phyir dang  sems can gyi don byed par srid pa'i phyir rgyu 'di rgyas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#472646#472646#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3031;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3032# 'das pa  med pa'i phyir ro // / +'di yang don bzhin te ston pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir zas zhes brjod do // /
column8: 0.026#TD4017E.TXT.r#2667492#2667492#TD4017E.TXT.r_1837# rtogs par bya ba ni theg pa rnam gnyis pa dag yang dag pa'i ngo bo mi shes shing theg pa rnam gcig gi don la mi gnas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes pa shes par bya ba'i phyir 'di bstan pa dang   'jug par bya ba ni mtshan nyid gsum po gang du bstan pa de la 'jug pa dang  thob par bya ba'i thabs bstan to // /
column9: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#932629#932629#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5473;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5474# spros pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // / +chos kyi dbyings  de sems can la yod PAR BSTAN PA'I PHYIR / /
column10: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1167741#1167741#TD4047E.TXT.r_6863# chos la ser sna byed pa gzhom pa'i don dang  ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i  phyir dang  sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column11: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2921526#2921526#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7457;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7458# gong du bshad pa ltar na 'du byed rnams skad cig ma'i ngang gis rgyun mi 'chad par yul gzhan du 'phos pa ma gtogs pa'i 'gro bar byed pa  zhes bya ba'i rdzas gzhan ni gang yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +tshig de dag gi mju  bsdu ba'i phyir / /
column12: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#804608#804608#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_6325# mdo nyid las bshad pa'i dbang po'i don mi srid pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: sems can don la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / / +gzhan gyi don lhur blang ba la bya ba chung ba ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column4: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692976#692977#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed PA NI SEMS CAN GYI DON BYA BA'I  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud pa LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column5: 0.023#TD4065E.TXT.r#428854#428856#TD4065E.TXT.r_298;TD4065E.TXT.r_299;TD4065E.TXT.r_300# sems nges pa med pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +thams cad KYIS ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA SMOS TE / /
column6: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#887127#887127#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19314;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_19315# grub pa la sgrub pa YIN NO ZHES BYA BA bstan pa'i phyir / / +sems can rnams KYI ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA RGYAS par smos so // /
column7: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed PA NI SEMS CAN GYI DON BYA BA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro ba LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS TE / /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690873#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod pa dag LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column9: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1164070#1164070#TD4047E.TXT.r_6303;TD4047E.TXT.r_6304# ci'i phyir ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA LA / / +don gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // /

column3: byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691210#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar GNAS PA LA KHONG KHRO BA DANG  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par mi BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column5: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694089#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyis rig pa ston par mi BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column7: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694282#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS CAN phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column9: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694338#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#694410#694412#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691147#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column13: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal BAR 'DOR NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694569#694569#TD4083E.TXT.r_1212;TD4083E.TXT.r_1213# skrod par mi byed na nyon  MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694473#694473#TD4083E.TXT.r_1203;TD4083E.TXT.r_1204# byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang  thos pa dang  gtong ba la sogs pa yang dag pa'i yon tan rjod par mi byed cing yang dag pa'i bsngags pa  mi brjod pa dang  legs par smras ba la legs so zhes bya ba ma BYIN NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin no // /

column3: le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +de ltar na yang byang chub sems dpas gzhan gyi don du nye du ma yin pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams las  gos brgya stong rnyed kyang btsal bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691144#691146#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i PHYIR NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691212#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# byang chub sems dpa' chos don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag DOG LA SOGS PAS NI CHOS sbyin par mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691381#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi SLOB PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693915#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1145;TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# nga rgyal gyi grogs byed du mi 'gro na / / +nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column11: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694241#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# byang chub sems dpa' nye du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  mnar sems kyi sems kyis mya ngan bsang bar mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column12: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694283#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column13: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694338#694338#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column14: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694411#694411#TD4083E.TXT.r_1197;TD4083E.TXT.r_1198# byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690903#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column3: des kyang brtags nas ji tsam dgos pa blang bar bya'o // / +de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang bsgrub par bya'o // /
column4: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#824179#824179#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9610;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9611# de bzhin du sa dang po'i khams gong ma bzhin du 'pho ba la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o // / +gzhan dag gi yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la / /

column3: nyes par mi 'gyur ba ni yal bar dor ba dang mthun no // / +snying brtser bcas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni / /
pha rol dang phyir slob mi    byed ;; / +ces bya ba las dmigs kyis bsal ba'o // /
snying brtser bcas zhes bya ba ni snying rje dang ldan zhing rjes su brtse ba dang ldan pa ste / /

de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi thabs la mkhas pas mi'i srog gcod pa dang  gzhan gyis bdag gir bye ba mkhyen par len pa dang  'dod  pa la spyod pa dang  brdzun du smra ba dang  mdza' bo dbye ba dang  tshig rtsub pas gshe ba dang  ngag 'khyal ba smra ba dang  de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i las rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa de la bu kun du spyad na nyes pa byas  par mi 'gyur la nyes pa med par 'gyur zhing / /
column4: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691869#691870#TD4083E.TXT.r_912;TD4083E.TXT.r_913# de lta smra bzhin du nyes par yang mi 'gyur zhing // / +bsod nams mang po 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro // /

column3: bsod nams mang po yang 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin na / / +bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnams lta ci smos / /
column4: 0.017#TD4083E.TXT.r#691867#691870#TD4083E.TXT.r_912;TD4083E.TXT.r_913# de lta smra bzhin du nyes par yang mi 'gyur zhing // / +bsod nams mang po 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro // /

column3: de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byis pa rnams rjes su bsrung  ba'i phyir 'khrig pa'i chos kyang rab tu bsten par bya ba yin na gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos // /
gang gi phyir byis pa rnams ni re zhig rang nyid kyi bag la nyal ba ma spangs shing // / +rgyun du tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i yul yang len par  byed de // /

dman pa la ring mo zhes shin tu zhen pa'o // / +las 'di yang shin tu ring mo nas goms pa'i phyir rang gi dang gis 'dod par 'gyur ba dang  shin tu yid la 'dod pa dang  myur du rkyen nye bar gnas pa la yang pha rol la snying brtse bas 'jug kyang nyes pa med do zhes bya'o // /

rtog  pa las nye bar gnas pa'i sems su byas nas 'khrig pa kun du spyod pa ni ltung bar 'gyur zhing bar ma chod par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang  'dul bar 'os pa mang po yang bstan pa la mi dad par 'gyur ba dang  'jig rten pa rnams kyang de'i gnas skabs kho na la gnas par  'gyur ba'i phyir rjes su 'jug par gzigs nas bdag nyid chen po yang 'khrig pa la brten pas sbyor bar mi mdzad do // /
column4: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095909#3095909#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_566# de bzhin nyid ni mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i bar dang  rtogs par gyur na yang de'i 'og tu rnam par gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid yid la byed pa'o // /

column3: de bzhin du mi'i srog gcod pa la sogs pa yang de rnams byed pa ma yin te / / +de lta bu'i rtogs pa las nye bar gnas pas 'jug par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i     // /

phyir ro // / +de lta mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' chom rkun pa // / +rkun pos srog chags che ba'i bdag nyid can dgra bcom pa dang  rang sangs rgyas dang  byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir gsod par bya ste / /
column4: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#152575#152575#TD4035E.TXT.r_4830;TD4035E.TXT.r_4831# 'jigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsod pa dang  'ching ba  dang  chad pa dang  nyams pa dang  smad pa la sogs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro // / +zang ZING CUNG ZAD TSAM GYI PHYIR ZHES bya ba ni nor dang  'bru dang dbyig la sogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.026#TD4026E.TXT.r#301378#301378#TD4026E.TXT.r_4704;TD4026E.TXT.r_4705# ZANG ZING CUNG ZAD TSAM GYI PHYIR TE / / +rnyed pa'i don du smra bar 'gyur grang na // /

column3: mtshams med pa'i  las mang po byed pa la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpas mthong la / /
column4: 4.768#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342707#1342711#TD4037E.TXT.r_3654;TD4037E.TXT.r_3655;TD4037E.TXT.r_3656# MTSHAMS MED PA'I LAS MANG PO BYED PA LA ZHUGS PA / / +byang CHUB SEMS DPAS MTHONG LA / /
column5: 4.768#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809989#1809993#TD4082E.TXT.r_387;TD4082E.TXT.r_388# MTSHAMS MED PA'I LAS MANG PO BYED PA LA ZHUGS PA DAG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS MTHONG LA / /

column3: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems kyis mngon par 'du byed de / / +gal te yang bdag gis srog chags de bsad na bdag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342719#1342722#TD4037E.TXT.r_3657# SROG CHAGS 'DI BSAD NA BDAG SEMS CAN DMYAL BA RNAMS SU SKYE BAR 'GYUR MOD KYI BDAG SEMS CAN DMYAL / /
column5: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810001#1810007#TD4082E.TXT.r_389# SROG CHAGS DE BSAD NA BDAG SEMS CAN DMYAL BA RNAMS SU SKYE BAR 'GYUR MOD KYI BDAG SEMS CAN DMYAL BAR skye ba ni bla'i / /

column3: bdag sems can dmyal bar skye ba ni  bla'i ; / +sems can 'dis mi mang po'i srog bcad cing mtshams med pa'i las kyang byas nas dmyal bar 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pas 'dzem bzhin du snying brtse ba'i sems kho nas srog dang bral bar byas na nyes par yang mi 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.021#TD4061E.TXT.r#1525385#1525389#TD4061E.TXT.r_1761;TD4061E.TXT.r_1762;TD4061E.TXT.r_1763# byams pa'i sems ni nyan pa po bde bar smon pas so // / +phan pa'i sems ni de la nyon mongs pa med par smon pas so // /

column4: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691864#691864#TD4083E.TXT.r_911;TD4083E.TXT.r_912# gzhan rnams kyi srog thar bar bya ba dang  chad pas gcod pa las    bskyab pa'i phyir zang zing med pa'i sems dang  snying brtse ba'i sems kho nas brdzun du SMRA BAR BYED LA / / +de lta smra bzhin du nyes par yang mi 'gyur zhing // /
column5: 0.027#TD4018E.TXT.r#3024044#3024044#TD4018E.TXT.r_2697;TD4018E.TXT.r_2698# gsung ba'i tshig dang  gzung  ba med pa'i tshig ni shes pa 'di sa chud par byed de / / +rtogs par byed 'dzin par skyed pas na gzung ba'i tshig go // /
column6: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#1333250#1333250#TD4037E.TXT.r_2391;TD4037E.TXT.r_2392# byang chub sems  dpa' bsam par bya ba ma yin pa spong ba na rmongs pa dang sems gyengs par mi 'gyur ro // / +rtag tu gus par byed pa'i sbyor bas rgyun du sems par byed na sngon ma rtogs pa'i don khong du chud cing thob par 'gyur la / /
column7: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#980790#980791#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_11580# gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don dang phan pa'i ched du sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su 'jug cing dmyal bar gnas kyang dmyal ba'i sdug  bsngal bar ma dang tha mas gnod par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos kyi dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu drag pos kyang de'i lus dang sems la gnod par mi 'gyur zhing bla na med pa'i bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column8: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1720988#1720988#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3119# rigs kyi bu khyim nas khyim med par dad pas rab tu byung nas chags sems dang 'dres pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pas rtog par byed do zhes mthong zhing smra bar 'gyur ro // /
column9: 0.029#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2564984#2564984#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3642;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3643# rgyud gnas par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyun brgyud pas gnas par byed do zhes  bya ba'i don to // / +zhing du sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni las bdag nyid skye ba dang mthun par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: de lta bus mdza' bo'i  dbyen byas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur la / / +bsod nams mang po yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.009#TD4083E.TXT.r#691750#691751#TD4083E.TXT.r_898;TD4083E.TXT.r_899# sems can 'dis mi mang po'i srog bcad cing mtshams med pa'i las kyang byas nas dmyal bar 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pas 'dzem bzhin du snying brtse ba'i sems kho nas srog dang bral bar byas na nyes par YANG MI 'GYUR LA / / +bsod NAMS MANG PO YANG 'PHEL BAR  'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1012543#1012543#TD4054E.TXT.r_3621# 'di ltar sems can de dag snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang bas bsod nams zad par 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342761#1342762#TD4037E.TXT.r_3662# nyes par yang mi 'gyur la bsod NAMS MANG PO YANG 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO // /

column10: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691957#691957#TD4083E.TXT.r_919;TD4083E.TXT.r_920# de ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig rtsub po SMRAS KYANG NYES PAR MI 'GYUR LA / / +bsod nams kyang mang DU 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO // /
column11: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2761026#2761027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8516# dge 'dun dkon mchog  la ni sems can mang po'i dbang du byas pa'i bsod nams MCHOG 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO // /
column12: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1216481#1216481#TD4047E.TXT.r_13527# snying rjes ni sems can rnams la tshad med pas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column13: 0.029#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810318#1810318#TD4082E.TXT.r_420;TD4082E.TXT.r_421;TD4082E.TXT.r_422# sems can la phan par 'dod pa'i gzhi 'ba'  zhig gis 'du shes bsgyur te shes bzhin du tshig gzhan du smra la / / +smra bzhin du nyes par yang MI 'GYUR TE / / +bsod NAMS MANG PO YANG 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO // /

column3: yang sems can gang lam log par zhugs shing mi rigs par byed pa dag la de dag de las slar bzlog pa'i phyir ci nas kyang 'di rim gyis nyes pa las ldog par gyur gyi bar du rtag  tu tshig rtsub pos sma 'bebs par byed do // /
column4: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344144#2344144#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3875;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3876# gzhan yang yid la byed pa'i sems nang du rgyun chags su byed pa'i yid la byed pas sems par byed do // / +de ltar  zhugs shing lan mang du gnas pa'i phyir lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni zhi gnas zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgo rnam pa gnyis yang dag par bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2518911#2518911#TD4019E.TXT.r_14760;TD4019E.TXT.r_14761# zhes pa ni skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang  gtsub shing la sogs pas mi rnams kyi nye bar spyod pa'i me 'byung bar 'gyur na / / +de dang 'dra ba'i sems can rnams gang gis 'byung zhes 'dri ba'o // /

column3: de ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig rtsub po smras kyang nyes par mi 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343111#1343115#TD4037E.TXT.r_3700;TD4037E.TXT.r_3701# DE LTAR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' TSHIG RTSUB PO SMRAS KYANG NYES PAR MI 'GYUR LA / /
column5: 1.192#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810397#1810407#TD4082E.TXT.r_428;TD4082E.TXT.r_429;TD4082E.TXT.r_430# 'di LTAR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I ni sems can lam log par zhugs shing mi rigs pa byed pa dag la thabs des ci nas kyang mi dge ba'i  gnas nas bslang ste dge ba'i gnas su 'god pa'i phyir rtag tu tshig rtsub pos drag tu sma 'bebs par byed de / / +de LTAR BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS TSHIG RTSUB POS SMRAS KYANG NYES PAR MI 'GYUR LA / /

column3: bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro // / +yang sems can gang gar dang glu dang  rol mo'i sgra dang  rgyal po dang chom rkun dang  zas dang   skom dang  smad 'tshong ma dang  lam srang gi gtam la sogs pa la mos pa rnams la de dag gi gtam rnams kyis ci nas kyang de mgu bar byas shing 'dun par byas te dbang du byas shing nyan du bcug nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343125#1343129#TD4037E.TXT.r_3702# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sems CAN GAR DANG GLU DANG ROL MO'I SGRA LA MOS PA RNAMS DANG  sems can rgyal po dang  chom rkun dang  zas dang  skom dang  smad 'tshong ma dang  LAM SRANG GI GTAM LA SOGS PA LA MOS PA RNAMS LA GAR DANG  glu dang  rol  mo'i sgra dang  gtam sna tshogs la mkhas te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810420#1810422#TD4082E.TXT.r_431# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can  GAR DANG GLU DANG ROL MO'I SKRA LA MOS PA RNAMS DANG  rgyal po dang  chom rkun dang  zas dang  skom dang  smad 'tshong ma dang  LAM SRANG GI GTAM LA SOGS PA LA MOS PA RNAMS LA / /
column6: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343171#1343172#TD4037E.TXT.r_3707;TD4037E.TXT.r_3708# de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshig kyal pa smra yang nyes par mi 'gyur la / / +bsod NAMS KYANG MANG DU 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO // /

column8: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342890#1342891#TD4037E.TXT.r_3678;TD4037E.TXT.r_3679# de ltar rnam grangs des byang chub sems dpa' ma byin par len bzhin du nyes par yang mi 'gyur la / / +bsod NAMS KYANG MANG DU 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO // /

column3: mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslang ste dge ba'i gnas la 'god par byed do // / +de ltar sna tshogs pa'i tshig kyal pa smra yang nyes par mi 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343169#1343172#TD4037E.TXT.r_3707;TD4037E.TXT.r_3708# de ltar na byang chub sems DPA' TSHIG KYAL PA SMRA YANG NYES PAR MI 'GYUR LA / / +bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810449#1810450#TD4082E.TXT.r_433# snying brtse ba'i bsam pas    gar dang glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang tshig 'khyal pa dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mgu bar byas shing 'dun par byas te dbang du byed cing ngag nyan du bcug nas MI DGE BA'I GNAS NAS BSLANG STE DGE BA'I GNAS SU DGOD PAR BYED DO // /
column6: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#689305#689305#TD4083E.TXT.r_633# bstan pa gnas par 'dod pa'i  phyar mu stegs can rnams zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar byed 'dod cing MI DGE BA'I GNAS NAS BSLANG STE DGE BA'I GNAS SU 'JOG PAR 'dod pa dang  ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang  dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir byed na nyis pa     // /

column3: bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro // / +byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa dang bcas pas srog gcod pa la sogs pa ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no // /

column3: 'khrig pa ni yod pa yin te / / +legs par  bsams nas rkyen gzhan yang nye bar mthong ba yod pa'i phyir ro // /

yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas gzhan gyi bud med mi tshangs par spyod pas gzir ba'i sems kyis bcings pa 'khrig pa 'dod pa 'di skad du bdag la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa yin na khyed kyi dbang du 'gyur     // /
gyi / / +gzhan du na nges par bdag srog kyang yongs su 'dor bar byed do zhes zer na / /
'di snyam du 'di kho bo la kun nas mnar sems skye bar gyur nas bsod nams ma yin pa mang du 'phel bar gyur na mi rung la / /
column4: 5.960#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810201#1810205#TD4082E.TXT.r_406;TD4082E.TXT.r_407# 'di ltar byang chub  sems dpa' khyim pas bud med khyim thab med pa mi tshangs par spyod pas gzir ba de la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa ZHIG LA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYI sems dang ldan par gyur nas / / +bsod NAMS MA YIN PA MANG DU 'PHEL BAR GYUR NA MI RUNG NGO snyam zhing / /
column5: 1.192#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342912#1342914#TD4037E.TXT.r_3680;TD4037E.TXT.r_3681# 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas  bud med mgo gtsang mi tshangs par spyod par 'dod pas gzir ba dang  'brel pa'i sems dang ldan pa ZHIG LA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYI sems dang ldan par gyur nas / / +bsod NAMS MA YIN PA MANG DU 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR NA MI RUNG ngo snyam nas / /

column3: 'dod pa thob par gyur pa las ni ji ltar  'dod pa bzhin du dge ba la yang dag par sbyar ba dang  mi dge ba yongs su 'dor ba la dbang du 'gyur ro snyam ste / /
snying brtse ba'i sems kho nas de log par gyem pa bsten kyang nyes par mi 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.019#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810234#1810235#TD4082E.TXT.r_410;TD4082E.TXT.r_411# mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i CHOS BSTEN KYANG NYES PAR YANG MI 'GYUR LA / / +bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel bar  'gyur ba lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1794233#1794233#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_11898;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_11899# dge slong dag de la sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i  dngos po bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas longs spyod chen po thob par 'gyur ro // / +tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas na mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.028#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810221#1810221#TD4082E.TXT.r_408;TD4082E.TXT.r_409# ci dga' dgur dge ba'i  rtsa ba la sbyar ba dang mi dge ba yongs su dor bar bya ba la dbang du yang 'gyur ro snyam ste / / +snying BRTSE BA'I SEMS KHO NA NYE bar bzhag nas 'khrig pa'i chos bsten na / /
column7: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1525385#1525389#TD4061E.TXT.r_1761;TD4061E.TXT.r_1762;TD4061E.TXT.r_1763# byams pa'i sems ni nyan pa po bde bar smon pas so // / +phan pa'i sems ni de la nyon mongs pa med par smon pas so // /
column8: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691741#691741#TD4083E.TXT.r_898# sems can 'dis mi mang po'i srog bcad cing mtshams med pa'i las kyang byas nas dmyal bar 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pas 'dzem bzhin du SNYING BRTSE BA'I SEMS KHO NAS SROG dang bral bar byas na nyes par YANG MI 'GYUR LA / /

column3: bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba lta bu'o // / +'di lta bu nyid las  dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems pas zhe sdang gis kun nas bslang ba'i ltung ba spang bar bya'i // /
column4: 0.010#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810234#1810235#TD4082E.TXT.r_410;TD4082E.TXT.r_411# mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten kyang nyes par yang mi 'gyur la / / +bsod NAMS KYANG MANG DU 'PHEL BAR  'gyur ba lta bu'o // /

column3: chags pas kun nas bslang ba ni de lta ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar gsungs so // / +de la chags pa las byung ba'i ltung ba bstan pa'i phyir chags pa'i sgra ni  'dir byams pa'i don te / /
byams pa de yang gad 'di gcig tu 'di rnams la phan pa nyid kyis 'jug pas rjes su zhugs pa ste / /
gang yang 'di nyid brtse ba dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par sdang ba ni ma yin no // / +ji skad du / /
byang chub sems dpa' sems can la / / +bu gcig pa  la bya ba bzhin // / +rkang gi khong nas byams pa che // /
column4: 0.0#TD4026E.TXT.r#295984#295986#TD4026E.TXT.r_3677;TD4026E.TXT.r_3678;TD4026E.TXT.r_3679# byang chub sems dpa'  SEMS CAN LA // / +bu GCIG PA LA BYA BA BZHIN // / +rkang GI KHONG NAS BYAMS PA CHE // /

column3: de ltar rtag phan byed par 'dod // / +sems can rnams la phan byed phyir // /

column3: de ltar chags skyes ltung mi 'gyur // / +'di ni zhe sdang rnam kun du // /

column3: rang gi bu de nye bar 'khyud nas 'dug / / +de 'dra ba la khong khro 'gal ba ltar // /

column3: brtser bcas lus can bu la'ang de dang 'dra // / +zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
snying brtse las gzhan pa ni gzhan dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o // / +'tsho ba log par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
'tsho ba ni 'tsho  bar 'gyur ba'i thabs spel bar byed pa zhes bye ba'i don to // /
log pa'i sgras ni log par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir smad pa'i tshig go // / +dman pas kun du 'tsho ba ni log par 'tsho ba ste / /
'tsho ba log par byed pa'i chos ni 'tsho ba log pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar btags nas bstan    pa'o // /

de yang chags pa las byung ba'i lus dang ngag gi las so // / +de yang tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa dang  chang dang mtshon cha dang dug dang  srog chags dang  rgya skyegs dang  'bru mar la sogs pa 'tshong ba dang  ma brtags pa'i til dang nyungs kar 'tshir ba'o // /
column4: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#7118#7119#TD4036E.TXT.r_942# rnam pa de dag GIS TSHUL 'CHOS PA DANG  kha gsag dang  GZHOGS SLONG DANG THOB KYIS 'JAL BA DANG  RNYED PAS RNYED PAR BYED 'DOD PA LA brten nas / /
column5: 0.013#TD4060E.TXT.r#683499#683500#TD4060E.TXT.r_400# bde ba nyid dang  nad med pa nyid dang  bdag dang bdag gi nyid du yang dag par rjes su blta'o zhes bya ba dang  tshul 'chos pa dang   kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  THOB KYIS 'JAL BA DANG  RNYED PAS RNYED PAR BYED 'DOD PA ZHES bya ba dang  zla ba phyed phyed cing tshes bco lnga la rgyal po chen po bzhi dag rang nyid ci mi'i 'jig rten na / /
column6: 0.013#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529508#1529509#TD4061E.TXT.r_2319;TD4061E.TXT.r_2320# de nyid kyi phyir 'dir gtsang bar phyin ci log par ma smos so // / +tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang   gzhogs slong dang  THOB KYIS 'JAL BA NYID dang  RNYED PAS RNYED PAR BYED 'DOD PA ZHES bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column7: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1343179#1343180#TD4037E.TXT.r_3709;TD4037E.TXT.r_3710# byang chub sems DPA' TSHUL 'CHOS PA DANG  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang      // / +thob kyis 'jal ba dang  RNYED PAS RNYED PAR BYED 'DOD PA LOG par 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len par byed cing / /
column8: 0.015#TD4082E.TXT.r#1810472#1810473#TD4082E.TXT.r_437# byang chub sems DPA' TSHUL 'CHOS PA DANG  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  THOB KYIS 'JAL BA DANG  RNYED PAS RNYED PAR BYED 'DOD PA LOG pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba  rnams dang du len cing / /

column3: gang yang zhing la sogs pa ni smos kyang ci dgos te / / +de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba dag las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs SDUD PAR BYED PA NI SEMS can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693036#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053;TD4083E.TXT.r_1054# de dag sel bar mi BYED PA NI DGE BA'I chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI PHA rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693302#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084;TD4083E.TXT.r_1085# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong BAR BYED PA NI DGE BA'I chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS bsdus pa'i rnam par DAG PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI log  par lta ba rnam par spangs PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693833#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135;TD4083E.TXT.r_1136# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS bla ma la rim gro byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693976#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151;TD4083E.TXT.r_1152# nad pa'i rim gro mi BYED PA NI NAD PA'I rim gro byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column9: 0.010#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI PHA rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column10: 0.018#TD4083E.TXT.r#693082#693083#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061;TD4083E.TXT.r_1062# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' BAR BYED PA NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column11: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692645#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007;TD4083E.TXT.r_1008# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column12: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691196#TD4083E.TXT.r_843;TD4083E.TXT.r_844# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi BYED PA NI DGE BA'I chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I  chos so // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690875#TD4083E.TXT.r_814;TD4083E.TXT.r_815# ches rgan pa la gus par MI BYED PA NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod PA DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692406#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par dga' BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column15: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#693712#693714#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124;TD4083E.TXT.r_1125# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI THOS PA la mngon par sbyor BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694307#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi don mi byed pa ni chos  dang zang zing gis bsdus pa'i BYA BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column18: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de RNAMS NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS DANG  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column19: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI TSHUL khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR // / +nyes BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column20: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693384#693385#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYIS THOS pa dang bsam pa la mngon par sbyor BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column21: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib PA DANG DU LEN PA NI SDOM PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI RTOG pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos SDUD PA'I TSHUL KHRIMS KYI snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs PA DANG DU LEN PAR MI  byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
