column13: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar khro ba la sogs pa de rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis SBYONG BAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi LEN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR // / +nyes BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column15: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang BAR MI BYED PA NI MYA ngan bsang bar BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column17: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694633#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs PAR 'OS PA RNAMS LA bsdigs pa la sogs PA MI BYED PA NI bsdigs pa la sogs pa'i BYA BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column18: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column19: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su SDUD PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column20: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel BAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol TU PHYIN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column21: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column22: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#694131#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA LA rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA NI BYAS pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column23: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' sems can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis zas dang  skom la sogs pa sbyin par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694048#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs PAR BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column5: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344826#1344827#TD4037E.TXT.r_3962# byang chub  SEMS DPA' ZAS DANG SKOM LA SOGS PA 'DOD PA RNAMS YANG DAG PAR SLONG BA LA ZAS DANG SKOM LA SOGS PA YO BYAD RNAMS KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYI SEMS DANG ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas ma byin na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur     // /
column6: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS SEMS CAN gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par GYUR NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column7: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#694180#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs PAS NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692815#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYIS SAM nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column9: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis MI 'GRO NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /

column5: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column6: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column7: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694181#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column3: gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa'i bya ba dag rang nyid kyis byas zin pa dang  mu stegs can yin pa  las chos rkur 'ongs la de yang 'dul ba'i skal ba med pa zhig yin na nyes pa med do // /
gzhan gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par mi 'jug pa ni gzhan gyi blo dang mthun par 'jug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694025#694027#TD4083E.TXT.r_1159;TD4083E.TXT.r_1160# gzhan sdug bsngal rnams ji skad bstan pas sdug bsngal sel bar MI BYED PA NI GZHAN GYI SDUG bsngal sel bar byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column5: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694198#694198#TD4083E.TXT.r_1178;TD4083E.TXT.r_1179# lan du phan gdags pa'i phyir 'bad kyang ma nus pa dang  de nyid lan du phan gdags par mi 'dod pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa la ni nyes pa med do // / +gzhan gyi zhes bya ba  LA SOGS PA LA / /
column6: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692326#692326#TD4083E.TXT.r_969;TD4083E.TXT.r_970# rgod pa ste rnam par ma zhi ba'i sems kyis rab tu rgod PA LA SOGS PA NI sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgod pa ma yin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rgod pas gzhan dag rgod du gzhug par 'dod cing / /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693567#693567#TD4083E.TXT.r_1110;TD4083E.TXT.r_1111# theg pa chen po dang ldan pa gang la la zhig zab pa'i gnas dag spong ba ni 'das ma thag pa lta bu dang  lta ba ngan pa spong BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // / +byang    chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las de kho na'i don nam // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693664#693664#TD4083E.TXT.r_1120;TD4083E.TXT.r_1121# bdag LA ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA LA BDAG la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyu'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // / +byang  chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis dam pa yin pa'i rlom sems kyis bdag la chags pa dang  gzhan la khong khro bas brnyas pa dang bcas pa dang  gshe ba dang bcas pas bdag la stod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /

column3: byang chub  sems dpa' kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gzhan gyi sems dang mthun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691211#691213#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos SBYIN PAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694090#694092#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong NA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYIS rig pa STON PAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694239#694243#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182;TD4083E.TXT.r_1183# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NYE du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  MNAR SEMS KYI SEMS KYIS MYA ngan bsang BAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694283#694285#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba LA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYI SEMS KYIS ZAS dang  skom la sogs pa SBYIN PAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694337#694339#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' 'KHOR 'dus pa LA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYI SEMS KYI chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don GYI MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column9: 2.384#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen BKUR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.021#TD4083E.TXT.r#691469#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par GYUR NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694049#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs PAR BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691145#691146#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas LEN PAR MI BYED NA SEMS can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691380#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692816#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYIS SAM nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690903#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas gus par mi byed cing stan las mi ldang la stan mi stobs NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis MI 'GRO NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /

column3: le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +na ste ma nus pa dang  'dul bar 'dod pa dang  bya ba de gnod pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang      // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#693990#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column6: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691055#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# byang chub sems dpa' chos  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column8: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel bar mi byed cing yal bar 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs par byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column3: dge 'dun gyi nang khrims srung ba dang  gzhan mang po dag gi sems srung bar 'dod pa dang  mu stegs can tshar gcad pa'i phyir ni nyes pa med do // /
column4: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#691318#691318#TD4083E.TXT.r_856;TD4083E.TXT.r_857# de rnams nyid la rjes su brtse  bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +de rnams 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  DGE 'DUN GYI NANG KHRIMS SRUNG BA DANG  GZHAN MANG PO DAG GI SEMS BSRUNGS NA NYES PA MED DO // /

column3: yon tan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +gzhan dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa smra bar mi byed pa ni yon tan  gyi bsngags pa smra ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /
column4: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693081#693082#TD4083E.TXT.r_1061# 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis dus 'da' bar byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis 'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas kyang gtam ngan pa  dang du mi len PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column5: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693204#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column6: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan BSANG BAR MI BYED PA NI MYA ngan bsang bar byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column7: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692790#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong BAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi len PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR // / +nyes BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column8: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693261#693261#TD4083E.TXT.r_1079# bsam gtan gyi bde ba nyams  su myong bar byed cing de la yon tan du lta ba ni dge ba chos dang sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang du mi len PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column9: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par DGA' BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column10: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693300#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column11: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693894#693895#TD4083E.TXT.r_1143# ji skad smras pa'i bya bar nye bar gnas pa la gzhan gyi grogs MI BYED PA NI SEMS can gyi don  bya ba rnams kyi grogs byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column12: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column13: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar KHRO BA LA SOGS PA DE rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du gnyer BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin PAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I  chos so // /
column15: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693713#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro BAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par SBYOR BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho ba DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column17: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su SDUD PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column18: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag SEL BAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column19: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693832#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column20: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#693975#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim GRO MI BYED PA NI NAD pa'i rim gro byed PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column21: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691279#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba RNAMS ZHES BYA BA LA  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi des PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column22: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin PAR MI BYED PA NI PHAN 'dogs pa sbyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column23: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694536#694536#TD4083E.TXT.r_1209# gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i BYA BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS  so // /

column6: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#690903#690903#TD4083E.TXT.r_816;TD4083E.TXT.r_817# khong  khro ba la sogs pas GUS PAR MI BYED CING STAN las mi ldang la stan mi stobs NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691058#691058#TD4083E.TXT.r_832;TD4083E.TXT.r_833# khyim dang gtsug lag khang gzhan du zas dang skom dang  gos la sogs pa  rnams la nye bar bos pa las nga rgyal la sogs pas bdag gir mi byed pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693732#693732#TD4083E.TXT.r_1125;TD4083E.TXT.r_1126# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS  sgrogs pa dang  chos dang 'brel ba'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa nang rgyal lam khong khro ba'i sems kyis mi 'gro NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694050#694050#TD4083E.TXT.r_1160;TD4083E.TXT.r_1161# byang chub  sems dpa' sdug bsngal bar gyur ba'i sems can dang phrad na nga rgyal gyis sam khong khro bas sdug bsngal de sel BAR MI BYED CING YAL BAR 'jog la rgyab kyis phyogs PAR BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column10: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691146#691146#TD4083E.TXT.r_839;TD4083E.TXT.r_840# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len par mi byed na sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691212#691212#TD4083E.TXT.r_844;TD4083E.TXT.r_845# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin par MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#691380#691380#TD4083E.TXT.r_861;TD4083E.TXT.r_862# ma dad pa dang ma gus pas mi slob pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYIS SAM nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column14: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column15: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#693991#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column16: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694091#694091#TD4083E.TXT.r_1166;TD4083E.TXT.r_1167# sems can dag mthong NA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYIS rig pa ston par MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694240#694240#TD4083E.TXT.r_1181;TD4083E.TXT.r_1182# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NYE du dang longs spyod las gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing mya ngan byung ba rnams la kun nas  MNAR SEMS KYI SEMS KYIS MYA ngan bsang BAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column18: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694284#694284#TD4083E.TXT.r_1186;TD4083E.TXT.r_1187# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS can phongs pa rnams zas dang skom la sogs pa yo byad 'dod pa rnams yang dag par slong ba LA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYI SEMS KYIS ZAS DANG  skom la sogs pa sbyin par MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /
column19: 0.029#TD4083E.TXT.r#694338#694338#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' 'KHOR 'dus pa LA KUN NAS MNAR SEMS KYI SEMS KYI chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang ZAS LA SOGS PA YONGS su brtsal ba don gyi MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pas NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin pa'o // /

column3: le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no // / +pha rol po rang bzhin gyis 'dod pa chung ngu yin par dpag ste / /

yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyu des 'di kun  nas nyon mongs par 'gyur du dogs pa dang  gtam rdzogs sdong su sdong ba dang  de'i yon tan rnams yon tan ltar bcos pa yin te yang dag pa ma yin pa dang  legs par smra ba yang legs par smra ba ltar bcos pa yin te / /
yang dag pa ma yin pa dang  'dul bar 'dod pa  dang  gzhan gyi sems srung par byed pa la ni nyes pa med do // /

rkyen du 'tsham pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +gzhan nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas pa dag la ji ltar 'tsham par tshar mi gcod pa ni tshar gcod pa'i bya ba las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos  so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba RNAMS ZHES BYA BA LA  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi DES PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column5: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694261#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# nor 'dod pa rnams la    nor sbyin par mi byed pa ni phan 'dogs pa SBYIN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column6: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694632#694633#TD4083E.TXT.r_1217# rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa dang ldan zhing bsdigs par 'os pa rnams la bsdigs PA LA SOGS PA MI byed pa ni bsdigs pa la SOGS PA'I BYA BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column7: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#693203#693204#TD4083E.TXT.r_1074# ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa dang du len pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi rtog pa ngan pa dang du mi len pa las nyams pa dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa dang du len par mi  BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column8: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#694213#694213#TD4083E.TXT.r_1180# gzhan rnams kyi mya ngan bsang bar mi byed pa ni mya ngan bsang bar BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column9: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par DGA' BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column10: 0.016#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column11: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin par mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I  chos so // /
column12: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#693711#693713#TD4083E.TXT.r_1124# chos nyan pa'i don 'gro bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi thos pa la mngon par SBYOR BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693383#693384#TD4083E.TXT.r_1093# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la mi  slob par nyan thos kyi theg pa la brtson pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis thos pa dang bsam pa la mngon par SBYOR BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column15: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan pa la gus par mi byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod PA DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column17: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692644#692644#TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs par mi byed na sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692730#692730#TD4083E.TXT.r_1016# gang slar KHRO BA LA SOGS PA DE rnams ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang  dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dag gis gzhan la phan pa don du GNYER BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692791#692791#TD4083E.TXT.r_1025;TD4083E.TXT.r_1026# shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims 'chal ba'i  gzhir gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang du mi LEN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR // / +nyes BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column20: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho BA DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column21: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column22: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel bar mi byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column23: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column24: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column25: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len par mi byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS TE / /
column26: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs par mi byed pa la rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs par mi byed pa ni byas pa la gzo ba rjes su srung ba  LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' sems can smra dbab par rigs pa dang  chad pas gcad par rigs pa dang  bskrad par rigs pa rnams nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis smra 'bebs par mi byed dam / /
chang pas gcod pas phyir 'chos par mi byed dam / / +skrod par mi byed na nyon  mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694178#694181#TD4083E.TXT.r_1176;TD4083E.TXT.r_1177# nga rgyal dang khong khro bas mnyam pa'am de bas lhag pa'i mthun pa'i phan gdags pas lan du phan mi 'dogs na nyon  MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column5: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#690977#690978#TD4083E.TXT.r_826;TD4083E.TXT.r_827# byang chub sems dpa' pha rol po  dag 'dri ba dang  kun du smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa la nga rgyal la sogs pas yang dag par lan mi 'debs pa dang  kun du mi smra ba dang  yang dag par dga' bar mi byed pa NI NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +le lo la sogs pa ni nyon  mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // /

column3: le lo la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o // / +bcos su mi rung ba'i rang bzhin can zhig ste / /
column4: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693159#693159#TD4083E.TXT.r_1069;TD4083E.TXT.r_1070# khong khro ba dang nga rgyal gyis non pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thad du gdams ngag tshol du mi 'gro na nyon mongs pa  can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PA NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column5: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#691467#691470#TD4083E.TXT.r_870;TD4083E.TXT.r_871# byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don lhur len pa la khong khro  pa la sogs pas don nyung zhing bya ba nyung la spro ba chung bas gnas par gyur NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692817#692817#TD4083E.TXT.r_1029;TD4083E.TXT.r_1030# kun nas mnar sems kyis sam nga rgyal gyis  non pas mthun par shad kyis sbyong bar mi byed de yal bar 'dor NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column7: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693916#693916#TD4083E.TXT.r_1146;TD4083E.TXT.r_1147# NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column8: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693991#693991#TD4083E.TXT.r_1153;TD4083E.TXT.r_1154# nga rgyal  gyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /
column9: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694338#694338#TD4083E.TXT.r_1191;TD4083E.TXT.r_1192# byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyi chos kyi dus dus su legs par mi 'doms shing legs par rjes su mi ston pa dang  zang zing gi sgo nas  phongs pa rnams la gos dang zas la sogs pa yongs su brtsal ba don gyi mi byed NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI nyes par 'gyur ro // / +le LO LA SOGS PAS NI NYON MONGS PA CAN MA YIN PA'O // /

column3: gtam byar mi rung la bka' blo mi bde zhing mnar sems kyi shas che ba yal bar bor ba dang  dus la gzhes pa dang  gzhi de las 'thab    pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang  dge 'dun bye bar dogs pas yal bar bor ba dang  sems can de dag rang bzhin gyis ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa dang ldan pas myur ba nyid du rang nyid phyir 'chos pa zhig yin na ni nyes  pa med do // /
column4: 0.007#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812639#1812643#TD4082E.TXT.r_727;TD4082E.TXT.r_728# dus la sdod NA NYES PA MED DO // / +gzhi DE LAS 'THAB PA DANG  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par 'gyur bar mi 'thad NA NYES PA MED DO // /
column5: 0.022#TD4087E.TXT.r#1566678#1566678#TD4087E.TXT.r_1241# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'thab pa dang  mtshang  'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par byed kyi / /
column6: 0.022#TD4087E.TXT.r#1567011#1567011#TD4087E.TXT.r_1283# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'thab pa dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod par byed cing / /
column7: 0.024#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2744127#2744127#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6132;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6133# gzhan    dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston na yang tshig kyal pa yin par brjod par bya'o / / +'thab mo dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  rtsod pa dang  'gyed pa la brten te tshig rjod par byed dam / /
column8: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1317242#1317242#TD4037E.TXT.r_148# bdag dang gzhan dag la gnod pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  phan par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin  pa'i 'thab mo dang  mtshang 'dru ba dang  'gyed pa dang  rtsod pa rnams dang  pha rol la rnam par 'che ba'i las gzhan dag la ni ma yin no // /

column4: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#694305#694307#TD4083E.TXT.r_1190# 'khor rnams kyi DON MI BYED PA NI chos  dang zang zing gis BSDUS PA'I BYA BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /

column10: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690826#690826#TD4083E.TXT.r_809# sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang du mi len cing 'dod pa chung ba dang  chog shes PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column11: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#690873#690874#TD4083E.TXT.r_814# ches rgan PA LA GUS PAR MI BYED PA NI SDOM pa'i tshul    khrims kyis shin du bsdams pa'i tshul khrims las spyod PA DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column12: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#692405#692406#TD4083E.TXT.r_978# ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi gcig tu rab tu dben par gnas pa la mngon par DGA' BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column13: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#693301#693301#TD4083E.TXT.r_1084# nyan thos kyi theg pa lhag par spong bar byed pa ni dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsdus pa'i rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi log  par lta ba rnam par spangs PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column14: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691195#691195#TD4083E.TXT.r_843# chos don du gnyer ba la sbyin PAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba'i chos sdud pa dang  sems can gyi don bya ba dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I  chos so // /
column15: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#691347#691347#TD4083E.TXT.r_859# MI BYED PA NI DGE ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column16: 0.024#TD4083E.TXT.r#693973#693975#TD4083E.TXT.r_1151# nad pa'i rim GRO MI BYED PA NI nad pa'i rim gro BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column17: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692272#692272#TD4083E.TXT.r_963# de lta bu'i log par 'tsho ba dang du len par byed pa ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'tsho BA DAG LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column18: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#692979#692979#TD4083E.TXT.r_1047# tshogs sdud par byed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i  tshul khrims kyi chos bzhin du tshogs yongs su sdud PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column19: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693033#693033#TD4083E.TXT.r_1053# de dag sel BAR MI BYED PA NI DGE ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column20: 0.025#TD4083E.TXT.r#693831#693832#TD4083E.TXT.r_1135# chos  smra ba la khyad du gsad pa'i ched du tshig 'bru la brten pa nyid ni dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis bla ma la rim gro BYED PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column21: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691280#691280#TD4083E.TXT.r_852# tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams zhes bya ba la  sogs pa la tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams yal bar 'dor ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi DES PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column22: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#694262#694262#TD4083E.TXT.r_1185# NOR 'DOD PA RNAMS LA    nor sbyin PAR MI BYED PA NI phan 'dogs pa SBYIN PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column23: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#693137#693137#TD4083E.TXT.r_1067# ting nge 'dzin gyi don mi tshol ba ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon  par bsgrub pa la brtson PA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /
column24: 0.026#TD4083E.TXT.r#691120#691120#TD4083E.TXT.r_837# len PAR MI BYED PA NI SEMS can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi grogs su 'gro BA LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS TE / /
column25: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#694130#694131#TD4083E.TXT.r_1172# gzhan phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA LA rjes su mthun pas slar phan 'dogs PAR MI BYED PA NI BYAS PA LA gzo ba rjes su srung ba  LAS NYAMS PA'I PHYIR NYES BYAS KYI GNAS LTA BU'I CHOS SO // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'  rdzu 'phrul rnam pa mang po'i nus mthu dang ldan la / / +sems can skrag par bya bar rigs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas skrag par mi byed pa dang  sems can 'dun par bya ba'i rigs pa rnams 'dun par mi byed na nyon mongs pa can gyi nyes par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344552#1344555#TD4037E.TXT.r_3923;TD4037E.TXT.r_3924;TD4037E.TXT.r_3925;TD4037E.TXT.r_3926# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NAD pa nad kyis thebs pa dang phrad pa na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan  pas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur mi byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column5: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344669#1344669#TD4037E.TXT.r_3939;TD4037E.TXT.r_3940# NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi byed na    NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin PA'I NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column6: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344750#1344751#TD4037E.TXT.r_3950;TD4037E.TXT.r_3951# nyon mongs  PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le LOS MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin PA'I NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column7: 0.017#TD4037E.TXT.r#1344802#1344802#TD4037E.TXT.r_3957;TD4037E.TXT.r_3958# NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le los sel bar mi byed na / /
column8: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1811958#1811958#TD4082E.TXT.r_631;TD4082E.TXT.r_632# NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le LOS MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin PA'I NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column9: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812067#1812069#TD4082E.TXT.r_646;TD4082E.TXT.r_647;TD4082E.TXT.r_648# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' TSHE 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la tshul bzhin ma yin par zhugs pa dag  mthong na kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang  khong khro ba'i sems dang ldan pas rigs pa dang  tshul bzhin ston PAR MI BYED NA NYES pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le los ston par mi  BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin PA'I NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column10: 0.017#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812205#1812207#TD4082E.TXT.r_667;TD4082E.TXT.r_668;TD4082E.TXT.r_669# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS can nye du dang  longs spyod las gyur pa'i sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams kyi mya ngan byung ba kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang ldan pas sel BAR MI BYED NA NYES pa dang bcas shing 'gal  ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le los sel BAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN MA yin PA'I NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column11: 0.019#TD4083E.TXT.r#691140#691142#TD4083E.TXT.r_839# byang chub sems dpa'  pha rol gyi gser la sogs pa bstabs pa nang rgyal la sogs pas len PAR MI BYED NA SEMS can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column12: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692567#692569#TD4083E.TXT.r_999# byang chub    sems dpa' bdag gi tshig mi btsun par 'gyur ba'i gtam ngan pa bden pa'i dngos po sel BAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column13: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#693475#693475#TD4083E.TXT.r_1102;TD4083E.TXT.r_1103# byang chub sems dpa' BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SDE snod nyid med kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin yod bzhin du phyi rol gyi bstan bcos te mu stegs can gyi bstan bcos  la brtson PAR BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +shin tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldob skyen pa dang  yun ring por yang yid mi brjed pa dang  don sems pa dang rtog par byed nus pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la rigs pas nye bar rtogs pa dang ldan pas blo mi 'gyur ba  dang ldan zhing nyin gcig bzhin du ches lhag par sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la brtson par byed pa yin na nyes pa med do // /
column14: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1342151#1342151#TD4037E.TXT.r_3570;TD4037E.TXT.r_3571# sems can yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le los len PAR MI BYED NA / /
column15: 0.020#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809389#1809389#TD4082E.TXT.r_307;TD4082E.TXT.r_308# sems can  yal bar 'dor ba'i phyir NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le los len PAR MI BYED NA NYES pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column16: 0.020#TD4083E.TXT.r#692285#692285#TD4083E.TXT.r_964# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' LOG pas 'tsho bar byed pa'i chos byung ba rnams dang du len cing mi 'dzem la sel BAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column17: 0.022#TD4083E.TXT.r#691208#691208#TD4083E.TXT.r_844# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHOS don du gnyer bas yang dag par nye bar gnas pa la khong khro ba dang  phrag dog la sogs pas ni chos sbyin PAR MI BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column18: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692351#692352#TD4083E.TXT.r_972# rnam pa sna tshogs pas smra bar byed 'dod NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI ltung bar 'gyur ro // /
column19: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#692951#692952#TD4083E.TXT.r_1043;TD4083E.TXT.r_1044# 'dzin par byed rjes su 'jug par byed na  NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column20: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#693227#693229#TD4083E.TXT.r_1076;TD4083E.TXT.r_1077# de rnams byung ba nyams su myong BAR BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column21: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1809483#1809483#TD4082E.TXT.r_326;TD4082E.TXT.r_327;TD4082E.TXT.r_328# chos sbyin PAR MI BYED NA NYES pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur te / / +nyon MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // / +snyom las dang le los sbyin PAR MI BYED NA NYES pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par ni 'gyur la / /
column22: 0.025#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812148#1812148#TD4082E.TXT.r_660;TD4082E.TXT.r_661# nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur  te ; / +nyon MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column23: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#693611#693611#TD4083E.TXT.r_1116# sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing spong BAR BYED NA NYON MONGS PA CAN GYI NYES PAR 'GYUR RO // /
column24: 0.027#TD4083E.TXT.r#692617#692617#TD4083E.TXT.r_1006;TD4083E.TXT.r_1007# 'chos PAR MI BYED PA NI nyes par snang bar bya ba'i don to // / +rigs pas ston par mi byed cing sma 'bebs PAR MI BYED NA SEMS can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su bstan pa rnam pa lnga las yang dang yang du ma gus  par gyur pas 'khrul pa la phan pa'i bsam pas sma dbab pas dran par byed du gzhug pa las nyams pa'i phyir nyes byas kyi gnas lta bu'i chos so // /

column3: sems can rnams gang  du shas cher mngon par zhen par gyur pa mu stegs can 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa dang  log par lta ba dang ldan pa zhig na ma bstan kyang nyes pa med do // /
column4: 0.023#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345284#1345287#TD4037E.TXT.r_4029;TD4037E.TXT.r_4030# SEMS CAN RNAMS GANG DU SHAS CHER MNGON PAR ZHEN PA MU STEGS CAN 'PHAGS PA LA SKUR BA 'DEBS PA / / +log PAR LTA BA DANG LDAN PA DAG CIG NA MA BSTAN KYANG NYES PA MED DO // /
column5: 0.023#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812711#1812714#TD4082E.TXT.r_736# SEMS CAN RNAMS GANG DU SHAS CHER MNGON PAR ZHEN PA MU STEGS CAN 'PHAGS PA LA SKUR BA 'DEBS PA LOG PAR LTA BA DANG LDAN PA DAG cig YIN NA MA BSTAN KYANG NYES PA MED DO // /

column3: de ltar re zhig nyes byas kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan nas yang nyes par mi 'gyur ba ji ltar rig par bya zhe na / /

snying rjer ldan  zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / +'dir bsgrub pa'i sgo dang  dgag pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba gang cung zad bstan pa de las mi 'da' bas ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ltung bar mi 'gyur ba gsal bar bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2560447#2560447#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3005# mi'i yang pha ma mi ma yin pa bsad na mtshams med PAR MI 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA BA NI mtshams med par mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2617396#2617396#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10085;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_10086# gzhi zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa'o // / +mu bzhi'o ZHES BYA BA NI YID 'byung bar 'gyur la 'dod chags dang bral BAR MI 'GYUR BA YANG yod / /
column6: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921664#921664#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3989;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3990# yongs su smin pa'i rang bzhin no // / +'gro ba'i mchog 'gyur ba ZHES BYA BA LA / /
column7: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1452699#1452699#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6210# par thal BAR 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI dag rtag tu rgyun chags par thal bar 'gyur ba'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2560599#2560599#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3029# de ji ltar mtshams med par 'gyur ZHES BYA BA NI DE lta bu'i mtshan nyid can de ni mtshams med par mi 'gyur ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column9: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#1135916#1135916#TD4047E.TXT.r_2129# rgyas par 'gyur TE ZHES BYA BA NI BSAGS pas zhugs par gyur pas khyad par can du 'gyur ba ste / /
column10: 0.028#TD4043E.TXT.r#376387#376387#TD4043E.TXT.r_2739# mi rtag pa'i chos mi rtag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yang ZHES BYA BA NI MA yin par dgag par 'gyur te / /
column11: 0.028#TD4061E.TXT.r#1531064#1531065#TD4061E.TXT.r_2517;TD4061E.TXT.r_2518# yid byung na 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro // / +'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol BAR 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA BA NI mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4095E.TXT.r#82162#82162#TD4095E.TXT.r_3796;TD4095E.TXT.r_3797# bslab    pa thams cad 'das na dri bar bya ba la bdag gis de lta bu ma byas SO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NYE bar gnas par 'gyur te / / +brdzun du smra bar thal bar 'gyur bas de'i ji ltar 'das par byas kyang bdag nyid 'chags par 'gyur snyam nas brdzun du smra ba las ldog par bshad do // /
column13: 0.029#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#870389#870390#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16805;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16806# de ltar na reg pa'i dus na nyon mongs pa can gyi tshor ba'i  rkyen tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yod do zhes bya bar shes par byas par 'gyur ro // / +de lta na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la / /
column14: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1200959#1200959#TD4047E.TXT.r_11294# de dag la skye ba yod par gyur na ni de 'gag par yang 'gyur bas de nyams par 'gyur ba yang 'thob PAR 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA ba smras pa / /
column15: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1997151#1997151#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2731;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_2732# thub pa ni gsum ste ZHES BYA BA LA / / +thub pa'i dngos po thub pa'i yin pa dang   'di thub pa'i yin pa ni thub pa'i'o // /

column3: 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin na yang nyes  pa med pa nyid ni 'di ltar sems dge ba ste / / +dge ba'i bsam pa dang  bsam pa ma nyams pa dang  'bras bu gcig pa'i dbang gis rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu las de dang 'dir ji skad du bstan pa las ma nyams par brtse ba dang ldan pa snying rje dang ldan pa sems can rnams la byams pa ste / /
phan  par 'dod pa dang  dul bar 'dod pa dad gdul bar bya bar 'dod pas 'da' bar byas pa ni nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1508310#1508310#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12607;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12608# de'i phyir dmyal bar sems can byung gi bar mi rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa la lhag mar bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgu 'da' bar  'gyur ro // / +chags pa'i gnas skabs de las 'da' ba yang de lta bur khong du chud par bya'o // /

column3: ngang gi sgras ni sems shin tu 'khrugs pa dang  tshor ba drag pos nyen pa dang  gnyid log pa dang  tha mal pa ma yin pa dang  spong bar 'dod kyang     // /
nyon mongs pa drag pos kun nas dkris pa la sogs pa dag gis slar yang 'jug pa dag gis 'das pa las ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to // /
sems ni shin tu nyon mongs dang / / +sdug bsngal tshor bas nyen pa dang / / +gnyid dang smyos pa  dag la ni // /
byung ba la yang nyes pa med // / +ces bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa gzhan no // / +don ni 'di ltar bstan par 'gyur te / /
chags pa dang  khong khro ba dang  phrag dog dang  khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  nga rgyal dang  rgyags pa la sogs pas 'das par gyur  pa ni nyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te / /
column4: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1136977#1136979#TD4047E.TXT.r_2261;TD4047E.TXT.r_2262;TD4047E.TXT.r_2263# de lta bas na 'khor ba 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur / / +don dang bcas par 'gyur ro // / +de dang bral bar gyur na 'bras bu med par 'gyur / /
column5: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#934198#934198#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5692# mi tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur na 'byor pa dam pa rnam pa gnyis 'thob PAR 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /
column6: 0.027#TD4098E.TXT.r#1395698#1395698#TD4098E.TXT.r_920;TD4098E.TXT.r_921# ngag gi sgras ni don brjod par mi 'gyur te / / +me zhes brjod pas tshig par gyur ta re / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#463592#463592#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1849# 'di ltar yi ge ni legs pa  brjod pas 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur la don ni skyon med pas bzhin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1216479#1216479#TD4047E.TXT.r_13526;TD4047E.TXT.r_13527# shes rab kyis 'dus byas rnams stong par mthong ba la gnas par 'gyur ro // / +snying rjes ni sems can rnams la tshad med pas GNAS PAR 'GYUR RO ZHES BYA BA'I DON TO // /

column3: des na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dngos su byung ba 'di dag ni mdor bsdus pa ste / /
gzhan byang chub sems dpa' dag gi spyod pa rnams ni dpag tu med cing mthar thug pa med pa'i phyir te / /
de rnams su  bstan pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas nyes par 'gyur ba dang nyes par mi 'gyur ba dag rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1129647#1129648#TD4047E.TXT.r_1222# zhes bya ba'i tshigs SU BCAD PA'I RJES SU 'BRANGS NAS MI dge ba'i grogs pos mi gyo ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: de ltar na rang gi 'dul ba'i bslab pa la 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur te / /

sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang  bsam  pa phun sum tshogs pa dang  sngon gyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa'o // / +de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dag bral bar mi byed cing / /
lus dang ngag dang yid kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang  nyes par rgyun du mi byed pa dang  sdig pa 'chags pa'o // /
column4: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2262962#2262962#TD4010E.TXT.r_4182# ces bya ba ni sems kyi rgyud ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas bsgos pa'i phyir lus dang  NGAG DANG YID KYI KUN DU SPYOD PA YONGS SU DAG PA YIN no // /

column3: bsam pa phun sum  tshogs pa ni gang yang 'di ni chos kyi bsam pas rab tu byung ba yin gyi 'tsho ba'i bsam pas ma yin byang chub chen po don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du gnyer ba ma yin / /
dge sbyong gi tshul dang mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi don du mi gnyer ba ma yin pa dang  de de ltar don du gnyer  bas le los gnas pa ma yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345703#1345708#TD4037E.TXT.r_4081;TD4037E.TXT.r_4082;TD4037E.TXT.r_4083;TD4037E.TXT.r_4084# byang chub sems dpa' chen PO DON DU GNYER BA YIN GYI / / +don DU MI GNYER BA MA YIN / / +dge SBYONG GI TSHUL DANG MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA DON DU GNYER BA YIN GYI / /

column3: brtson 'grus mi zhen pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba dang  rims nad dang bcas pa dang  rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba dang  phyi ma la skye ba dang rgya shir 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o // /
column4: 1.192#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345719#1345722#TD4037E.TXT.r_4085# BRTSON 'GRUS MI ZHAN PA dang  KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA DANG  yang 'byung ba pa dang  RIMS NAD DANG BCAS PA DANG  RNAM PAR SMIN PA SDUG BSNGAL BA DANG  PHYI MA LA SKYE BA DANG  RGA SHIR 'GYUR BA'I SDIG  PA MI DGE BA'I CHOS RNAMS DANG MA 'DRES PA ste / /
column5: 0.013#TD4045E.TXT.r#397325#397325#TD4045E.TXT.r_322# kun nas  nyon mongs pa dang  yang 'byung ba pa dang  RIMS NAD DANG BCAS PA DANG  RNAM PAR SMIN PA SDUG BSNGAL BA DANG  PHYI MA LA SKYE BA DANG RGA SHIR 'GYUR BA'I SDIG PA MI DGE BA'I CHOS RNAMS DANG  ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni de la tshe 'di LA KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA PHYI ma phyi ma grub pa'i phyir  KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA RNAMS so // /

column3: sngon    gyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345746#1345749#TD4037E.TXT.r_4089;TD4037E.TXT.r_4090# BYANG CHUB SEMS DPAS SNGON TSHE RABS GZHAN DAG TU BSOD NAMS BYAS SHING DGE BA BYAS TE / /

column3: des da ltar bdag nyid gos dang zas dang mal cha dang stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams kyis phongs par mi 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1345750#1345758#TD4037E.TXT.r_4089;TD4037E.TXT.r_4090# byang chub sems dpas sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas te / / +des da ltar bdag nyid kyang  gos dang  zas dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  NA BA'I GSOS SMAN DANG  YO BYAD RNAMS KYIS PHONGS PAR MI 'GYUR LA / /

column3: gzhan dag la yang bgo  bsha' byed nus pa ste / / +phun sum tshogs pa gsum po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro // /
rdzogs sangs rgyas sras mchog rnams kyi sdom pa nyi shu pa // / +bshad pa'i bsod nams rdo rjes sgrib pa'i ri bo'i tshogs // /
phug nas  bsal te rgyal dang lhan cig rnam dag cing // / +dri med mig gis dngos po'i de nyid mthong bar shog / /
'di ltar 'dis ni byis pa'i sems nyid rang bzhin gyo ba 'di // / +rnam 'phrul nyon mongs sna tshogs las brgal byang chub mchog bzung nas // /
gcad par dka' ba gnyis  su kun spyod gnyis 'dzin gcad mkhas shing // /
'jig rten 'di yi phongs pa zhi byed byang chub bzang por bdag gyur cig / /
byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa'i dka' 'grel / / +slob dpon byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// /
